Admin¶

class user.admin.JWTAdminSite(name='admin')¶

Custom admin site for JWT authentication.

login(request, extra_context=None)¶

Display the login form for the given HttpRequest.

class user.admin.JWTLoginView(**kwargs)¶

Custom login view for JWT authentication.

Used for JWTAdminSite.

form_valid(form)¶

Return the response with JWT tokens.

Args:

form: A valid form object.

Returns:

HttpResponseRedirect: The response with JWT tokens, redirects to success url.

class user.admin.UserAdmin(model, admin_site)¶

Custom user admin for JWT authentication.

add_fieldsets = ((None, {'classes': ('wide',), 'fields': ('email', 'first_name', 'last_name', 'password1', 'password2')}),)¶
add_form¶

alias of UserCreationForm

filter_horizontal = ()¶
form¶

alias of UserChangeForm

list_display = ('email', 'first_name', 'last_name', 'is_staff')¶
property media¶
ordering = ('email',)¶
search_fields = ('email',)¶
class user.admin.UserChangeForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, instance=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)¶

A form for updating users. Includes all the fields on the user, but replaces the password field with admin’s password hash display field.

Form fields:

  • email: E-mail (EmailField)

  • password: Password (ReadOnlyPasswordHashField)

  • first_name: Имя (CharField)

  • last_name: Фамилия (CharField)

  • is_active: Активный (BooleanField)

  • is_staff: Администрация (BooleanField)

clean_password()¶
property media¶

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

class user.admin.UserCreationForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, instance=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)¶

A form for creating new users. Includes all the required fields, plus a repeated password.

Form fields:

  • email: E-mail (EmailField)

  • first_name: Имя (CharField)

  • last_name: Фамилия (CharField)

  • password1: Password (CharField)

  • password2: Password confirmation (CharField)

clean_password2()¶
property media¶

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

save(commit=True)¶

Save this form’s self.instance object if commit=True. Otherwise, add a save_m2m() method to the form which can be called after the instance is saved manually at a later time. Return the model instance.
